Using FaunaDB with an Identity Provider with OpenID Connect

FaunaDB offers built-in user authentication, session and password management. While this is well-documented, working with an external authentication and identity service is much harder. In this article I will show you my solution.

About me

I am a programmer, living in Neuenkirchen, Germany, close to the Dutch border.
Professionally, I have been doing Java development for almost 10 years, using rich client libraries like Swing and SWT, as well as back-end frameworks like Spring Boot. Lately, my interest shifted to web development and the JAM stack with technologies like React, Eleventy, FaunaDB and Netlify.
